meanings.definition: Having the texture or consistency of cream.
meanings.sent1: The mashed potatoes were the creamiest I had ever tasted.
meanings.sent2: She loved the creamiest ice cream flavors.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fur looked so creamy, it was almost like it had the creamiest coat in the world.
meanings.sent4: The creamiest clouds floated lazily in the sky, resembling fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent5: The creamiest silk fabric felt like a gentle caress against her skin.

meanings.sent1: The creamy sauce was the creamiest part of the dish.
meanings.sent2: Her favorite dessert had the creamiest topping.
meanings.sent3: The creamiest aroma of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen, making everyone's mouth water.
meanings.sent4: The creamiest sunset painted the sky in shades of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The creamiest lotion left her skin feeling soft and smooth.

meanings.definition: Containing a high proportion of cream.
meanings.sent1: The cake was the creamiest treat at the party.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed the creamiest coffee in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The creamiest milkshake was so thick, it was almost like drinking a dessert.
meanings.sent4: The creamiest soup warmed her up on a cold winter day.
meanings.sent5: The creamiest cheesecake melted in her mouth, leaving a rich flavor behind.
